title: Failed to Create Isolated Environment (E_CREATING_ISOLATED_ENV_FAILED)
body: Desktop App Converter] constantly fails with the E_CREATING_ISOLATED_ENV_FAILED error.

comments.body: I posted a problem related to this here https://wpdev.uservoice.com/forums/110705-universal-windows-platform/suggestions/17410183-e-creating-isolated-env-failed-with-baseimage-1496

Today I tried to convert a app, and got :
---
DesktopAppConverter: error 'E_CREATING_ISOLATED_ENV_FAILED': Failed to create the isolated environment.
---
Tanaka (MSFT), thank you! I've sent you my logs.
So, the problem is temporarily solved (for me).

I have installed a fresh Enterprise insider build to a Hyper-V machine and was able to run the converter without any issues. My primary real machine is Windows 10 Pro upgraded from 8.1 (upgraded from 8), so maybe this is the issue.
